extendedInfo.description: Based on the world famous Silent HillÂ® videogame, SHRadio reacts on proximity to WiFi networks by emulating interference heard. Getting closer to a wifi hotspot will make the interference louder for a true Survival Horror experience.[0.3]* Better Compatibility.

reviews.title: More Silent Hill
reviews.comment: Ok this app is pretty cool but the only thing annoying about it is that you can hear the loop to the static sound of the radio. This app should have more radio options as well like more static from silent hill 2 and 3 and so on, also a volume adjuster on the radio. The ability to hear this app even though you press the power button would awesome as well.  One last thing, can anyone make a Soundboard of the whole series? Please Update Soon!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool idea
reviews.comment: I have no complaints b/c it\'s free. There is no menu or no way to use the other radios in photos. However not a big deal. It would be cool if the static was creepier and had random indecipherable radiotalk screams and such. Good effort, now step it up to 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Love it!Blast from the past!Got hooked on Silent Hill when it was first released.Wasn\'t into video games at all,but as soon as my friend would turn up without his Play Station(1!!)I\'d be disappointed.Change of plans & we\'d play into the early hours. Hearing this radio effect makes me want to relive it all over again!! Forza Silent Hill!!
reviews.author: Lourdes baby

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Silent Hill forever!
reviews.author: Justin Waloshin

reviews.comment: Hey buddy, many SH fans and I would LOVE it if you could make the app run in the background, and make it a widget. More sounds would be great too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun like the game; -)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: LoL it\'s cool but silent hill needs more apps like games, prank apps or even themes. Other wise it\'s good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Fun way top check for wireless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome! Great concept, well executed. Very cool app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Feature
reviews.comment: Is it possible for you to add a feature such that this app can run in the background even when my phone is locked? I\'d like to hear the sound start automatically when I pass a Wi-Fi spot and the phone is locked and/or the app is minimised. This can be the perfect Wi-Fi hotspot finder notification! Btw, great app, thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good concept
reviews.comment: But the sound is not continue it chop every 1-2 secs. Make the sound file longer so the loop wont make it choppy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Amazing! Just wish it would keep playing when your screen was off but still a mighty 5 star! I still play SH1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Brilliant app for SH fans, but as many others have said, this would be so much better if it could run in the background.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very awesome, and a great idea. Just add a feature making it run *silently* in the background until you get near a wi-fi signal and you\'re GOLDEN.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Scairy
reviews.comment: I think the freakiest sounds came for the silent hill 2 and 3 radio. In either 2 or3 you hear chanting or a creepy monster mocking you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a great idea for SH fans to have on their phones. My boyfriend was impressed. Only thing, it doesn\'t get loud near a wifi. It sounds the same
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Walking around at night by the woods when its quiet. This gets scary. Need some more sounds. Like sh2 radio. And the sound stop faster..?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs improving
reviews.comment: First impressions - the radio static is not constant which detracts greatly from the experience, and as others have already said this does not run in the background.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love it! but PLEASE make it so it plays in the backround too, and when the phone is off!! It will make it 1,000,000 timea better!  ( :
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awseme! Fantastic for fans. You should make this a widget. Don\'t like to close it to use other apps. 4 stars till then.
reviews.author: A Google User
